quiz.title: Algebra: Complete the Square and Quadratic Graph

questions.question: Complete the square in $y = 8x^2 + 8x + 1$.
questions.explanation: Factor 8: $y = 8(x^2 + x) + 1$. Complete square: $x^2 + x = (x + \frac12)^2 - \frac14$. Then $y = 8(x + \frac12)^2 - 2 + 1 = 8(x + \frac12)^2 - 1$.

questions.question: How many times does $y = -5x^2 + 6x - 2$ cross the x-axis?
